org.opensaml.soap.common

Interface SOAPHandler<MessageType>

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - the type of message being handled
    All Superinterfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, MessageHandler<MessageType>

    public interface SOAPHandler<MessageType>
extends MessageHandler<MessageType>
    Interface for MessageHandlers that are specific to SOAP message processing.

Set<QName> understandsHeaders()
        Get the set of SOAP header names that the handler indicates it understands.
